tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,
review:
Overall cool experience. Doctor is ready to listen the problem and explain in detail. I would recommend this Doctor for all type of  Ortho problems(joint pains, knee pain, back pain etc.,). I visited numbers of  Doctor's and  had BAD  experience. This Doctor is very very good and nice. At the time of treatment I am unable to move and walk, after using medicines he has prescribed to me  I  come out of all my pains   within 5 days and now I am 100% fit and walking 
 and climbing steps easily without anybody's support. 
Thanks Doctor,
D PADMA KUMARI,Tandur

I had an ankle fracture, he treated me well, explained and his therapy worked for me.. so good experience. He charges 650/ consultation and then 2 X-rays 0f 850/-  E by KIMS Kondapur ( I feel it’s too much), and then one temperory and one for 6 weeks plaster and medicines.
There is waiting for everything like X-ray and plaster.but over all good.

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,
review: Doctor Suresh Babu is an extremely calm and patient doctor. My mother in law's knee replacement surgery was done in Kim's by him and it was a wonderful experience. He is always reachable on his mobile and he promptly responds to calls/SMS and whatsapp..so the post surgery period was easy to sail through. Recently my daughter fractured her hand and he treated..he gave us a lot if assurance and helped thru the whole process of insurance and asked his team to help when he was not around when we went to the emergency after the accident . Overall I would recommend this doctor to my friends and family.

** ****** **** **  *** ** ************* ** ********* ** ********* *** **** ****** **** ** ******* *** **** explain cause and cure and he is very honest and never recommend  unnecessary  test .I will recommend Dr suresh babu to everyone.
Thanks
SHRISH TRIPATHI
Overall cool experience. Doctor is ready to listen the problem and explained the issue. I would recommend this doctor for knee pain.

He is one polite and easy going doctor, will explain you the stuff and then give proper input. I had to be operated and that was quick and smooth.
overall my experience was great and will have no regrets seeing him again for future Ortho issues

Dr. Suresh is an expert and very good in diagnosing the problem in a proper way ( eliminating the odds) and provide right treatment base on the problem. He is very good in explaning it rightly to the patient before treatment.

Dr Shubhash babu is found very cxcelent ** *********, courteous and cooperative in behavior. 
Best wishes to Dr and ur hospital as well.
Regards 
Rajnikant
He is very good! Always makes you comfortable diagnoses well and provides the right approach to your problem. Doesn't unnecessarily ask for x rays and provide a lot of medication so that's good!
Very Good. Patiently explained the problem and guided us on further  tests. Cleared all our doubts and  prescribed course of treatment. Dr office staff was also very responsive .

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,
review: Dr. Suresh Babu is Very Compassionate, Professional Doctor. I have visited for my mallet finger injury. The way he received and treated is so satisfactory.

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,
review: After bad experience with previous doctor we went to Dr. Suresh Babu for my moms shoulder fracture and he treated her with considering other complication in mind and gave the simplest treatement and assurance that after 6 weeks shoulder fracture will be fine and hand can be used normally .

He is so kind to listen to patient.explained the problem so cleared.

but hospital charging registration fee more than specified.

He does not unnecessarily prescribe medicines where pain can be reduced using physiotherapy or exercises. 

Found useful even in case of lower back pain.
Experience with doctor was quite good. Diagnostics and analysis was clearly explained, such that one can easily understand the severity of the problem.
********* *** ***** ********** Explained issue well, suggested remedies.  I will definitely suggest him for others
********* ******* He explained what the problem was and how it'd be treated. He was very patient. Any Orthopedic problem, he is the man.

tags: Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,
review: he is very good doctor ,his medicines worked for my neck muscle spasm ,I will recommend him to everyone

I have a good experience with the Doctor. This is my second visit on different different injuries. There was a fracture in my hand and he is kind enough to explain the where is the fracture and what are the way to treat it. I am quiet happy with the treatment.

tags: Explanation of the health issue,Doctor friendliness,
review: Great doctor, Very comforting, approaches step wise to the issues, does not rushes to expensive solutions or surgery options.
